title: It crashes trying to access directory `Nethermind`
body:
**Description**
It tries to access directory `Nethermind`.

**Steps to Reproduce**
I installed Nethermind to the directory `/usr/share/blockchain-installer`.

```sh
cd /usr/share/blockchain-installer
sudo -u blockchain env DOTNET_BUNDLE_EXTRACT_BASE_DIR=/var/cache/blockchain \
  /usr/share/blockchain-installer/Nethermind.Runner \
  --config config.cfg \
  --datadir /var/lib/blockchain --Init.LogDirectory /var/log/blockchain \
  --KeyStore.KeyStoreDirectory /etc/blockchain-installer/keystore
```

**Actual behavior**
Nethermind crashes trying to access the directory /usr/share/blockchain-installer/Nethermind

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
Please provide the following information regarding your setup:
 - Operating System: Ubuntu
 - Version: 22.10
 - Installation Method: my own custom `.deb`
 - Consensus Client: not used

**Logs**

`config.cfg`:
```
{
    "Init": {
        "WebSocketsEnabled": true,
        "StoreReceipts" : true,
        "EnableUnsecuredDevWallet": true,
        "IsMining": true,
        "ChainSpecPath": "./configs/genesis/spaceneth.json",
        "BaseDbPath": "nethermind_db/spaceneth",
        "LogFileName": "spaceneth.logs.txt",
        "StaticNodesPath": "Data/static-nodes.json",
        "ReceiptsMigration": true
    },
    "Mining": {
        "Enabled": true
    },
    "Network": {
        "DiscoveryPort": 30300,
        "P2PPort": 30300,
        "LocalIp": "127.0.0.1",
        "ExternalIp": "127.0.0.1"
    },
    "JsonRpc": {
        "Enabled": true,
        "Host": "127.0.0.1",
        "Port": 8545
    },
    "Blocks": {
        "MinGasPrice": 0
    },
    "Aura": {
        "AllowAuRaPrivateChains": true
    },
    "Sync": {
        "FastSync": true
    }
}
```
